10. Dhomir/ kata ganti َأَنْت untuk dipergunakan..

a. kamu (laki-kaki) = أَنْتَ

b. kamu (perempuan) = أَنْتِ

c. dia (laki-laki) = هُوَ

d. dia (perempuan) = هِيَ

11. kata yang termasuk dhomir/kata ganti adalah..

a. هَذَا = ini

b. هَذِهِ = ini (ة)

c. ذَلِكَ = itu

d. أَنَا = saya

12. kata ganti dhomir dari قضيت adalah

a. أَنْتَ = kamu (laki-kaki)

b. هُوَ = dia (laki-laki)

c. هِيَ = dia (perempuan)

d. أَنَا = saya

related_questions.question:
6. How did you    Your last weekend ? (spent / spend)
7. We ............. to the collage yesterday (walk / walked)
8. Julio
an active student last year (were / was)
9. 1
a cake to your house last night (bring / brought)
10. I ............ an elephant last night (draw / drew)​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

6. spent

7. walked

8. was

9. brought

10. drew

Penjelasan:

semua jawaban tersebut adalah bentuk Verb2. khusus no.8 alasan jawaban yang tepat was karena, was untuk bentuk tunggal (si julio) sementara were untuk bentuk jamak.

semoga membantu! jadikan jawaban tercerdas ya

related_questions.question:
Peraladins UI Dewan UMUR Menjawab Soal 10 - 20!    My name is Calista Antartika. Just call me Calista. My school is SD Pandemi. I am the student of the
fifth class. I will tell about professions that I can find at my school. There are headmaster, teachers, a
librarian, school staffs, and a gardener
Headmaster is the person who leads a school. Teachers are person who teach the students. Librarian
is a person who works in a library School staffs are persons who take care of the school's administration
and a gardener is a person who takes care of the school garden.​

answers.answer:
My name is Calista Antartika. Just call me Calista. My school is SD Pandemi. I am the student of the

fifth class. I will tell about professions that I can find at my school. There are headmaster, teachers, a

librarian, school staffs, and a gardener

Headmaster is the person who leads a school. Teachers are person who teach the students. Librarian

is a person who works in a library School staffs are persons who take care of the school's administration

and a gardener is a person who takes care of the school garden.​

Nama saya Calista Antartika. Panggil saja aku Calista. Sekolah saya adalah SD Pandemi. Saya adalah murid dari

kelas lima. Saya akan menceritakan tentang profesi yang dapat saya temukan di sekolah saya. Ada kepala sekolah, guru, a

pustakawan, staf sekolah, dan tukang kebun

Kepala Sekolah adalah orang yang memimpin sekolah. Guru adalah orang yang mengajar siswa. Pustakawan

adalah orang yang bekerja di perpustakaan Staf sekolah adalah orang yang mengurus administrasi sekolah

dan tukang kebun adalah orang yang merawat taman sekolah.​

related_questions.question:
UPY
Write at least three of tools in a hospital and the functions!
Answer​

answers.answer:
1.Baby incubator

is a device to provide heat, humidity and controlled oxygen

2.Stethoscope

a medical device used to hear sounds from within the body, especially from the heart

3.UV lamp

Ultra violet (UV) lamp has a function as a radiation sterilizer to kill microorganisms

I hope this help

●• STUDY WITH MEE •

●OETAMA05

JANGAN LUPA JADIKAN BRAINLIEST ANSWER

Stethoscope, doctors in hospitals use this tool to hear the patients heart beats, intestinal movement, breath sounds, etc.

X- ray, X rays are usually used to check fractured bones, but there are more use to x rays

injection, injections are used for injecting a drug or vaccine to a human body

related_questions.question:
Tolong bantuin..    I. Fill in the blanks with the correct "Be" (Is, Am, Are)

1. The girl ____ my sister.
2. Diana and Putri ___ good friend. 
3. The children ___ in the park.
4. I ___ a student. 
5. Where ___ your Father now?
6. What ___ Rudy talking now with Rina? 
7. ___ she your teacher?
8. Why ___ you here? 
9. What ___ your mom writing?
10. Who ___ you waiting for? 


II. Write your own sentences with the following words.

1. From
4. Yesterday
2. Always
5. Canteen
3. Will


III. Pilihan Ganda

1. I am sorry, I don't ___ with you. 

 a. Agree
 b. Agreeing
 c. Disagree
 d. Agrees

2. I am afraid I have to ___ with you.

 a. Agreeing
 b. Disagree
 c. Agrees
 d. Disagreeing


 ​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

I.

  1. is
  2. are
  3. are
  4. am
  5. is
  6. is
  7. is
  8. are
  9. is
  10. are

II.

  1. this postcard is from my friend.
  2. she always makes me happy.
  3. i will go to your house tomorrow.
  4. he brought me to the zoo yesterday.
  5. i wanna go to canteen in the breaktime.

III.

  1. A
  2. B

cmiiw

Jawaban:

A.

1.the girl is my sister

2.diana and putri are good friends

3.the children is at the park

4.i am a student

5.where is your father now?

6. what is rudy talking now with rina?

7.is she your teacher?

8.why are you here?

9.what is your mom writing?

10.who are you waiting for?

b.

1.where are you from?

2.yesterday my dad brings me a new bike!

3.wow you are always come early tiara!

4.it's lunch time ! I wanna go to thee canteen!

5.your score is 100,you will be the 1st winner

c.

1.A

2.B
